availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William A. Smyth (Captain of the 9th Kentucky Cavalry (Co. B); Lived in Hart County)

body.p: Served as captain of the 9th Kentucky Cavalry (Co. B) from August 1862 to April 1863. Lived in Three Spring, Kentucky.

bibl.p: William A. Smyth, 9th Kentucky Cavalry, Compiled Service Record, (https://www.fold3.com/image/272/221822947) (accessed on March 16, 2017); Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 232; Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 948.
